Html:
HI,

I´m experiencing an issue trying to import the solution to a CRM 2015 Online.
When I try to Import it pops an error.
"You can only import solutions with package version 7.0 or earlier into this organization. Also, you can´t import any solutions into this organization that were exported from Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 or earlier."

Can you help me with this?
Thanks in advance :)
I am having the same issue with an on-premise instance - is there a plan for a version compatible with CRM 2015?
